entity.name: Gavin Newsom
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text:
@GavinNewsom Over 5 Months have passed since the Coronavirus started and 
This Fucking Administration still doesn’t have a Plan!
The President goes golfing like it’s ok if 130 Thousand Americans have Died!
Citizens need to realize its up to them to slow the spread!
